Title: Write your Own Virtual Machine
Description: By: Justin Meiners and Ryan Pendleton

Title: Distributed Systems Made Easy: URL Shortener Architecture with .NET Aspire
Description:
Want to master Clean Architecture? Go here: https://bit.ly/3PupkOJ
Want to unlock Modular Monoliths? Go here: https://bit.ly/3SXlzSt
Join a community of 1000+ .NET developers: https://www.patreon.com/milanjovanovic

Want to build complex distributed systems without the headache? In this video, we'll create a URL shortener from scratch using .NET Aspire, showing you how to properly set up PostgreSQL, Redis caching, and implement HybridCache for better performance. You'll learn how to wire everything together using Aspire's orchestration, plus we'll add proper observability with OpenTelemetry so you can actually see what's happening in your system. Perfect for developers who want to see how Aspire makes building production-ready distributed systems way easier than before.

.NET Aspire: A Game-Changer for Cloud-Native Development?
https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/dotnet-aspire-a-game-changer-for-cloud-native-development

Check out my courses:
https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/courses

Read my Blog here:
https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog

Join my weekly .NET newsletter:
https://www.milanjovanovic.tech

Chapters
0:00 What is a URL Shortener?
2:18 Building the URL Shortener API
6:38 Adding .NET Aspire orchestration
10:58 Implementing the shortening logic
19:10 Distributed tracing and metrics

Title: Critical: .NET Install links are changing - .NET Blog
Description: The .NET installers and archives distribution method is currently changing unexpectedly. This change may impact your development, CI, and production infrastructure. It is crucial to validate if you are affected and monitor for any downtime or disruptions.
